after:
region      = "eu-west-1"
environment = "dev"

dynamodb_table = {
  name                   = "checkout-basket"
  billing_mode           = "PAY_PER_REQUEST"
  hash_key               = "id"
  range_key              = "sortKey"
  point_in_time_recovery = false

  attributes = {
    "id"         = "S"
    "sortKey"    = "S"
    "customerId" = "S"
  }

  ttl = {
    attribute_name = "timeToLive"
    enabled        = true
  }

  global_secondary_indexes = [
    {
      name               = "idx_by_customer_id"
      hash_key           = "customerId"
      projection_type    = "ALL"
      range_key          = ""
      read_capacity      = null
      write_capacity     = null
      non_key_attributes = []
    },
    {
      name               = "index-emailhash-type"
      hash_key           = "emailHashType"
      range_key          = "createdAt"
      projection_type    = "ALL"
      non_key_attributes = null
      read_capacity      = null
      write_capacity     = null
    },
    {
      name               = "index-alert"
      hash_key           = "alert"
      range_key          = "createdAt"
      projection_type    = "ALL"
      non_key_attributes = null
      read_capacity      = null
      write_capacity     = null
    },
  ]

  tags = {
    team        = "checkout"
    application = "basket"
  }
}
